feature.label: GUERY DSL Feature
feature.provider-name: Software Technology Group TU Dresden / DevBoost GmbH
feature.description: This is a textual DSL for the GUERY framework (http://code.google.com/p/gueryframework/). This DSL was developed and generated with EMFText (http://www.emftext.org/) and is used within the generic model refactoring framework Refactory (http://www.modelrefactoring.org/).
